familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former member/president of THC Miami Restaurant Hospitality LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest.

Former chairman/director/president of THC Miami Restaurant Hospitality Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Thc Miami Restaurant Hospitality Member Corp.
